name: Despair ^3
description:
Games Members Despair3
 **Award for Best Implementation**
**Crowd Voted Best Design**
- Athens Game Jam 2018
 - This is a 3d platformer where you avoid obstacles and reach your goal with one surprise element-you have no control over the gravity.
- We love hearing feedback! Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/NDcisiveGames/
Designed and created by: Andrew Ho, Steven Coffey, Xavier McCartney, & Zach Smith
